instructions.description: Template for adding cultural events to the database
instructions.usage: Copy the template below and fill in the information for each event you want to add
important_notes: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS (e.g., 2025-04-12T10:00:00)
If event is a single day, use the same date for start_date and end_date
If no specific time, use 00:00:00 for the time portion
featured: true will make the event appear in featured sections
show_in_cultural_calendar: true will make it appear in the cultural calendar on homepage
image_url can be a path to local image or URL (use null if no image yet)
description can be null if you don't have one yet

title.example: Festival Internacional San Luis en Primavera

description.description: Detailed description of the event. Can be null.
description.example: Annual cultural festival celebrating the rich heritage of San Luis Potosí with music, dance, and art exhibitions.

end_date.description: When the event ends. Use same as start_date for single-day events.

location.example: Plaza de Los Fundadores, Centro Histórico

image_url.description: URL or path to event image. Can be null.

featured.description: Whether to feature this event prominently

show_in_cultural_calendar.description: Whether to show in the cultural calendar section

place_id.description: UUID of related place from places table. Usually null for new events.

category_guide.cultural: General cultural events, traditions, heritage celebrations
category_guide.arts-culture: Art exhibitions, museum events, cultural showcases
category_guide.culinary: Food festivals, cooking events, gastronomic celebrations
category_guide.other: Events that don't fit other categories

example_events.title: Festival Internacional San Luis en Primavera
example_events.description: Major international spring festival celebrating arts and culture with concerts, exhibitions, and performances by renowned artists including Eugenia León, Fernando de la Mora, and Ramón Vargas. Free events at Plaza de Los Fundadores.

example_events.title: Kuitólil Festival - 6th Edition
example_events.description: National reference festival showcasing performing arts for children and youth. Multiple venues including Teatro de la Paz.
example_events.location: Teatro de la Paz and other venues

example_events.title: Marco Antonio Solís Concert
example_events.description: Legendary Mexican singer-songwriter performs at Arena Potosí.
